description: Number of nonnegative solutions to x^2 + y^2 + z^2 <= n^2.
references: H. Gupta, A Table of Values of N_3(t), Proc. National Institute of Sciences of India, 13 (1947), 35-63.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..500
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[Boole[x^2 + y^2 + z^2 <= n^2], {x, 0, n}, {y, 0, Sqrt[n^2 - x^2]}, {z, 0, Sqrt[n^2 - x^2 - y^2]}]; A000604 = Table[an = a[n]; Print["a(", n, ") = ", an]; an, {n, 0, 100}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Feb 10 2016 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _David W. Wilson_, May 22, 2000
